forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain ending this morning. Breaks of sun in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning rain. High around 55F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 6C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 42F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 13C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High near 55F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 4C. Winds ENE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 38F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 8C. Winds E at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 44F. Winds E at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 1C. Winds E at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 32F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Gusty winds diminishing in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds ESE at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High near 45F. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 1C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 32F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High 44F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 4C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 38F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 46F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low near 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 11C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 51F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 49F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
